Articles.Content:
I have a quistion.

When are there coming updates for consoles because its been like 1 year since the last one?

On 6/10/2020 at 3:34 PM, DevilThomas_NL said:

I have a quistion.

When are there coming updates for consoles because its been like 1 year since the last one?

It could be a while, DLCs are like 6 months behind PC, and updates are 0.5ish behind PC, so like 4-5 months lag between.

Actually I just looked, and it has been 9 months since 1.8.1, and console has yet to get it. But DLCs are like 6-8 months lag from the PC version. It is dumb, but an outside developer ports the info for consoles, and they're slower than snail mail. I got my snail mail last week.
